column2: After gaining independence from the neighbouring Anglo-Saxon realms, [Root.GetTitledName] has proclaimed the foundation of the 'House of West Seaxe'. This noble house shall be recognized as distinct from any other ruling dynasty, and [Root.GetTitledFirstName] and [Root.GetPossPronoun] offspring will no longer refer to former relatives as kin.
Glory to the House of West Seaxe!

After gaining independence from the neighbouring Anglo-Saxon realms, [Root.GetTitledName] has proclaimed the foundation of the 'House of Mercia'. This noble house shall be recognized as distinct from any other ruling dynasty, and [Root.GetTitledFirstName] and [Root.GetPossPronoun] offspring will no longer refer to former relatives as kin.
Glory to the House of Mercia!

After gaining independence from the neighbouring Anglo-Saxon realms, [Root.GetTitledName] has proclaimed the foundation of the 'House of East Seaxe'. This noble house shall be recognized as distinct from any other ruling dynasty, and [Root.GetTitledFirstName] and [Root.GetPossPronoun] offspring will no longer refer to former relatives as kin.
Glory to the House of East Seaxe!
